content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 4, Brighton and Hove Albion 0.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 4, Brighton and Hove Albion 0.
Lewis Dunk (Brighton and Hove Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Danny Ings (Liverpool).
Goal!  Liverpool 4, Brighton and Hove Albion 0. Andrew Robertson (Liverpool) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner.
Substitution, Liverpool. Ben Woodburn replaces Mohamed Salah.
Substitution, Liverpool. Danny Ings replaces Roberto Firmino.
Adam Lallana (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dale Stephens (Brighton and Hove Albion).
